title: No chromas {Gameplay}
body:
Bought 4 chromas with ip in the order of: Bard, Blitz, zac, morgana.

and cannot use any of them, at one point i got to use both the bard and blitz chromas but since then i havent been able to use any of them and I am extremely frustrated that i have spent 8000IP to use 2 chromas once. Please fix this and I would like to know if anyone has similar issues

replies.body:
Hey there,

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support about this issue as we here on the boards are unable to assist with account-related issues.
